Description of incident: Pivotal Software notified individuals of a databreach when they were a victim of a phishing scam. "On March 22, 2016 a third party sent a fraudulent email message impersonating CEO Rob Mee to an employee requesting certain information about Pivotal employees. The employee responded to the request, mistakenly believing that it came from Mr. Mee."More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-60798
